main.name: Muhammad Hakimi Bin Mastor
main.bio: A passionate graduate in Software Engineering and IT related fields. Eager to acquire more knowledge and experience in Android Development, Internet of Things and Software Engineering in general. I have provided training for teachers in IEEE-TISP KPM Initiatives, published several android application in Google Play Store. (2k+ downloads since Aug 2018), won several awards including at IPITEX Bangkok 2020 and actively conducted and participated various events from university level under Software Engineering Student Club up to International Competitions.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor of Software Engineering with Honors
education.description: I was highly active with student activities under Software Engineering Student Club and outside communities (Devcon) and profersional organisation (IEEE Malaysia Section). I also achieved dean awards for 4 semesters and awarded as IEEE Open Day Malaysia Ambassador 2019.
I took pure science stream, biology, physics, chemistry and mathematics.

work.title: Mobile Developer (Android)
work.description: Develop and deliver new mobile applications, improve upon and optimize existing applications, and provide technical support as needed in resolving issues on new and existing applications.

work.title: Intern - IT Analayst
work.description: Using Informartica ETL and Oracle Software for MFRS9 related projects, perform enhancement and testing (mainly on SIT and UAT) using PL/SQL and UNIX script. Perform troubleshooting task, to identified data issue or rule configuration issue for Maybank Core Banking and data from Malaysia, Singapore and International data warehouse

projects.title: Surau Mana Apps (UPSI)
projects.category: Navigation app to find nearest surau in UPSI
